title: 14 DAYS BAN BECAUSE OF 1 WORD
body:

replies.body: Editing the logs in any fashion is an act of bad faith and makes any protestations to innocence meaningless, as we're forced to assume you're continuing to try and sugarcoat what you actually did.
https://imgur.com/a/0LpDG screenshot for those who think i erased swearing
Well you did edit the logs that you posted.  In the screenshot you typed "ihturito2: # rest of team is pussy-made" whereas in your post you edited it to "ihturito2: # rest of team is coward-made."
GOTCHA youre the 1st and only 1 to notice.  unfortunately i dont have a prize to give you.   but the TICKET #33904848 has only truth in it about 2 bad words so dont worry ;)
You need to update that copy-and-paste software dude

Toxic all game.

You get banned for attitude and intent, not words. The system is a little smarter than you give it credit for.
oh wait there is a thing for it. called mute and chat restriction!

If this is your first punishment, I think this warrants a chat restriction (i.e. I don't think it is behavior warranting an escalated punishment to a 14 day ban) and I recommend contacting Riot via support ticket.

If you've been punished previously (for example, a 10 game chat ban followed by a 25 game chat ban) then the next punishment in line was a 14 day suspension, and the temp ban is appropriate.
as i said, this is a daisy-fresh account. i had only 1 afk because of blackout in whole city, but game has been remade
If that's the case i'd definitely contact Riot Support.
It isn't due to the word "bitch" as that's not a bannable word.  Have you had a recent chat restriction?  If so, this is just the next punishment tier and a normal progression.
ths it the very first form of punishment/warning/whatever i got

In that case, if you are positive that you did not say any racial or homophobic slurs in the pre- and post-game lobby, I would recommend submitting a ticket to Player Support asking them what specifically in your logs was responsible for escalating your punishment directly to a 14 day suspension.  As long as you are polite, and assure them that you are simply asking so that you do not repeat the mistake in the future, they should be more than willing to assist you.
It takes 2-3 days to get an answer.
Did you said any more words in pre- and post- game too?  They do scan that. They just can't show it atm.
they only show one game. if they found out flame in other games then they should put them in logs aswell

They were talking about the pre and post game lobby of the match. 

Champ select and the Stat screen.
